item.title: Bitcoin Isn't Money, Florida Judge Rules in Laundering Case
item.description:
Bitcoin Isn't Money, Florida Judge Rules in Laundering Case

A landmark criminal case believed to be the first involving a money-laundering charge involving bitcoin has seen its verdict. The criminal charges thrown out, with bitcoin not deemed to qualify as money, according to the ruling judge. Defendant Michell Espinoza was arrested in 201andmd charged with "illegally selling and laundering" $1,500 in bitcoin to an undercover law enforcement officer.

item.title: Bitcoin Scam Site Warning - 10Bitz
item.description:
Bitcoin Scam Site Warning - 10Bitz

The time has come to look at yet another Bitcoin Ponzi Scheme, of which there are far more than one can count these days. 10Bitz offers some interesting rewards for investors, but no one should expect any legitimacy from this company whatsoever. Earning 10% daily forever sounds quite appealing, but funds will dry up eventually.

item.title: How to Maintain and Repair Dual-X and Other Non-Serviceable GPU Fans
item.description:
How to Maintain and Repair Dual-X and Other Non-Serviceable GPU Fans

There are a lot of people that use various GPUs for mining with the stock fans that the video card comes with and normally many of these fans start to have issues in just a couple of months or after a year or so.

item.title: The 6 best Bitcoin mining software
item.description:
The 6 best Bitcoin mining software

Are you thinking of joining the Bitcoin mining universe? In case you don't know, you can either mine on your own or as part of a pool.

item.title: Gibraltar Stock Exchange Introduces Bitcoin Backed ETI - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Gibraltar Stock Exchange Introduces Bitcoin Backed ETI - NEWSBTC

Gibraltar Stock Exchange has approved the inclusion of BitcoinETI as a tradable instrument on the exchange platform. Read more... Gibraltar Stock Exchange has announced the introduction of a new Bitcoin backed security into its list of trading instruments. BitcoinETI, with the assigned ticker BTCETI is an asset-backed Exchange Traded Instrument created by Argentarius ETI Management and invested exclusively in Bitcoin.

item.title: EB141 - Ralph Merkle: Revolutionizing Democracy Using DAOs
item.description:
EB141 - Ralph Merkle: Revolutionizing Democracy Using DAOs

Legendary scientist and cryptography pioneer Ralph Merkle joined us to discuss his recent paper on DAOs. Merkle examined how the voting mechanisms in today's democracies are flawed and how a decentralized, transparent DAO making decisions using prediction markets could create more efficient democratic systems. Topics covered included: Merkle proofs, Merkle Roots and his early forays into cryptography Blockchains as living organisms Why DAOs will be subject to a Darwinian evolutio...

item.title: Coinbase CEO: Possibility That Ether Blows Past Bitcoin is Very Real
item.description:
Coinbase CEO: Possibility That Ether Blows Past Bitcoin is Very Real

While Ether has had a bounce in its value buoyed by the successful hard fork, it has also suffered a split with some miners sticking to the discarded Blockchain and starting their own currency called Ethereum Classic.

item.title: I want to create a contract as a service platform using a blockchain back end. But who's blockchain should I use?
item.description:
I want to create a contract as a service platform using a blockchain back end. But who's blockchain should I use?

item.title: Bitcoin Network Hashrate Shows First Big Dip Since Halving
item.description:
Bitcoin Network Hashrate Shows First Big Dip Since Halving

An interesting change is taking place in the Bitcoin mining ecosystem right now. Ever since the halving occurred, there has been a question as to whether or not the number of miners would start to diminish. While it is still early to tell, there has been a drop in hashrate all of a sudden.

item.title: SovereignBTC #89 Think Win/Win from Seven Habits and Jason King on Decentralized Homeless Outreach
item.description:
SovereignBTC #89 Think Win/Win from Seven Habits and Jason King on Decentralized Homeless Outreach

In this episode of SovereignBTC, John Bush interviews Jason King of Sean's Outpost about his new project, Unsung, an effort to connect people with excess food with activists looking to help feed the homeless. We talk about Sean's Outpost use of bitcoin to help their philanthropic efforts.
